title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
**Product Listing: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor**

**Description:**
Bring a touch of modern elegance to your home with our stunning 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor. Each mirror features a unique "circle on circles" design that is sure to be a conversation starter in any room. The perfect combination of art and functionality, these mirrors are designed to add a touch of sophistication to your living space.

**Product Details:**

* Set includes 2 mirrors
* Diameter with frame: 15.7 inches (diameter of mirror alone: 10 inches)
* Frame material: Durable iron
* Hanging method: Easy to hang with a single screw
* Weight: 2 pounds per mirror
* Glass quality: High-quality annealed glass with HD imaging for a crisp, clear reflection
* Frame color: Gold with a finish that's between matte and bright
* Suitable for various decoration styles and locations, including living rooms, bedrooms, bathrooms, entryways, and office spaces

**Styling Options:**
These mirrors are designed to be versatile and can be styled in a variety of ways to suit your unique decor. Some popular options include:

* Creating a stunning picture wall with multiple mirrors and other wall art
* Hanging above a TV or fireplace for a sleek, modern look
* Combining with paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces for a unique and eye-catching display
* Styling independently as a solo piece of art

**Key Features:**

* Unique "circle on circles" design adds a touch of modern elegance to any room
* High-quality annealed glass with HD imaging for a crisp, clear reflection
* Durable iron frame with a gold finish that's both stylish and long-lasting
* Easy to hang with a single screw for a convenient installation process
* Versatile design can be styled in a variety of ways to suit your unique decor

**What's Included:**

* 2 x 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors
* 2 x Hanging screws
* Decent packaging for safe delivery

**Order Now:**
Don't miss out on the opportunity to elevate your home decor with our stunning 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor. Order now and get ready to add a touch of modern elegance to your living space!
